Subject: Promotion & Reward Philosophy Roadshows, Schooling Allowance Update, Coffee with Tracey, Commuting and Indoor Comfort Survey, Together, We Are a Great Place to Work, Learn New Skills by Joining Transform Chalhoub & Internal Jobs
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/sLocQHAbskGcGee4eHplPw/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png>

PROMOTION & REWARDS PHILOSOPHY ROADSHOWS


Based on your feedback from the Voice of the People survey, we understand how important it is to have clarity around promotions and salary changes.

Join a session with Jad Nassif – Director Rewards to learn more about promotion policy, reward philosophy, salary structures, increase, and review cycle.

- HO1: Mon 21 Oct | 2pm - 3:30pm
- HO2: Mon 28 Oct | 2pm - 3:30pm
- D3: Wed 30 Oct | 2pm - 3:30pm

Sign up to join <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fform.jotform.com%252f231273604710447%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWdSGYvXyA9Vz7rx7x%252b0%252fT40JgIlbPwYAD5F0WQV9md3yUKt0Bein7xq5Q6LT6FpRtO1%252bl8ShIh9HDW1Kh9GDBoXSrj0cDydWtjGRUf0GvGl8XSHN%252fL%252bZpWJiIOXNYXWkHr9ka6sChv2vvqDEqZ0RMdjDR9fTpvMlVYgJ2AQy9SET2jstvctzu7lEBfKPhUl3CrhsQCiz4p3PykuUo2JsZiz2mjMHIc3tuIlOxIpTn%252fPZ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1d935a0be3e04544687508dceea6a6e9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638647646739108471%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=d8HtsHTwBmxdPefhyvYS%2FO8cGgUVOzEJGOG5HrJvozU%3D&reserved=0>

SCHOOLING ALLOWANCE UPDATE

Recognising the important role of education, and as part of our ongoing commitment to supporting you and your families, we are introducing an increase in the schooling allowance. This will be implemented starting with the second payment in May 2025, covering the entire school year.

Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252feur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com%252f%253furl%253dhttps%25253A%25252F%25252Fwww.onechalhoub.com%25252Fdocuments%25252Fpreview%25252F25191%25252FSchooling-Policy%2526data%253d05%25257C02%25257CYasmine.Uthman%252540chalhoub.com%25257Ca084cfc313aa4ecc3af808dceda80e82%25257C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%25257C0%25257C0%25257C638646553298223138%25257CUnknown%25257CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%25253D%25257C0%25257C%25257C%25257C%2526sdata%253d0%25252FPcLZA81dd2%25252BWGcyGWpd%25252B%25252FMWLtGrpIbM2Y5iUTywBg%25253D%2526reserved%253d0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWdSGYvXyA9Vz7rx7x%252b0%252fT40JgIlbPwYAD5F0WQV9md3yUKt0Bein7xq5Q6LT6FpRtO1%252bl8ShIh9HDW1Kh9GDBoXSrj0cDydWtjGRUf0GvGl8XSHN%252fL%252bZpWJiIOXNYXWkHr9ka6sChv2vvqDEqZ0RMdjDR9fTpvMlVYgJ2AQy9SET2jstvctzu7lEBfKPhUl3CrhsQCiz4p3PykuUo2JsZiz2mjMHIc3tuIlOxIpTn%252fPZ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1d935a0be3e04544687508dceea6a6e9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638647646739135541%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=lo%2F3oOOcTMT1kPSC3%2FRRRhOgTL4vP6C7gpDM05YGM1E%3D&reserved=0>

COFFEE WITH TRACEY

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/sLocQHAbskGcGee4eHplPw/549526/A5C1F5BF9EA98D8C1FB106234C15E0EB/coffee-with-the-presidents-08-1.png> 	
Join Tracey Griffin - Chief Financial Officer for an informal, open hour to network, ask questions, share your thoughts, and connect through meaningful and transparent conversations!

Tuesday, October 22nd from 3 - 4 pm at D3, The Library.

Secure your spot to join us!

RSVP NOW <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fform.jotform.com%252f231293269523458%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWdSGYvXyA9Vz7rx7x%252b0%252fT40JgIlbPwYAD5F0WQV9md3yUKt0Bein7xq5Q6LT6FpRtO1%252bl8ShIh9HDW1Kh9GDBoXSrj0cDydWtjGRUf0GvGl8XSHN%252fL%252bZpWJiIOXNYXWkHr9ka6sChv2vvqDEqZ0RMdjDR9fTpvMlVYgJ2AQy9SET2jstvctzu7lEBfKPhUl3CrhsQCiz4p3PykuUo2JsZiz2mjMHIc3tuIlOxIpTn%252fPZ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1d935a0be3e04544687508dceea6a6e9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638647646739152854%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=h7%2BAfGDltAc8s25DHCOoCLa8stetFlmCpe%2BvbBg1V7c%3D&reserved=0>

COMMUTING AND INDOOR COMFORT SURVEY

As part of our efforts to reduce our carbon footprint and promote sustainability across our operations, we are applying for the LEED Green Building certification for our HO1, HO2, DIP, and MWH buildings. Complete this 2-min survey, <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fforms.office.com%252fr%252f9qJhf5Q4S7%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWdSGYvXyA9Vz7rx7x%252b0%252fT40JgIlbPwYAD5F0WQV9md3yUKt0Bein7xq5Q6LT6FpRtO1%252bl8ShIh9HDW1Kh9GDBoXSrj0cDydWtjGRUf0GvGl8XSHN%252fL%252bZpWJiIOXNYXWkHr9ka6sChv2vvqDEqZ0RMdjDR9fTpvMlVYgJ2AQy9SET2jstvctzu7lEBfKPhUl3CrhsQCiz4p3PykuUo2JsZiz2mjMHIc3tuIlOxIpTn%252fPZ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1d935a0be3e04544687508dceea6a6e9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638647646739167680%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=xOwmfq19c9DOgQPcTvOoVbCUUjn979XOn4tMQJhymAw%3D&reserved=0>  to support us in achieving this certification to enhance the efficiency and environmental impact of our buildings.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/sLocQHAbskGcGee4eHplPw/550500/3FE8B41BE91AA25D9EF6C7715F9BE1D5/pexels-mizunokozuki-13801777.jpg>

TOGETHER, WE ARE A GREAT PLACE TO WORK!

Since we began our journey, our reach has expanded across the region, and today we are proud to announce that the Group is officially Great Place to Work Certified in eight countries! This achievement reflects the collective voice of our people and stands as a testament to the culture we continue to build together. Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f59238%252ftogether-we-are-a-great-place-to-work%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWdSGYvXyA9Vz7rx7x%252b0%252fT40JgIlbPwYAD5F0WQV9md3yUKt0Bein7xq5Q6LT6FpRtO1%252bl8ShIh9HDW1Kh9GDBoXSrj0cDydWtjGRUf0GvGl8XSHN%252fL%252bZpWJiIOXNYXWkHr9ka6sChv2vvqDEqZ0RMdjDR9fTpvMlVYgJ2AQy9SET2jstvctzu7lEBfKPhUl3CrhsQCiz4p3PykuUo2JsZiz2mjMHIc3tuIlOxIpTn%252fPZ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1d935a0be3e04544687508dceea6a6e9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638647646739181209%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=WLEGlfrE1bVp%2FaGFq3g9IxXKMRaz2uqU2kO5S6fmcyg%3D&reserved=0>

LEARN NEW SKILLS BY JOINING TRANSFORM CHALHOUB

Transform Chalhoub is set to revolutionize our operations by introducing innovative end-to-end business processes and state-of-the-art systems like SAP and Blue Yonder with dynamic opportunities for you to be part of it.

Hear from your colleagues who participated in previous transformations! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f58854%252fare-you-ready-to-transform-chalhoub%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWdSGYvXyA9Vz7rx7x%252b0%252fT40JgIlbPwYAD5F0WQV9md3yUKt0Bein7xq5Q6LT6FpRtO1%252bl8ShIh9HDW1Kh9GDBoXSrj0cDydWtjGRUf0GvGl8XSHN%252fL%252bZpWJiIOXNYXWkHr9ka6sChv2vvqDEqZ0RMdjDR9fTpvMlVYgJ2AQy9SET2jstvctzu7lEBfKPhUl3CrhsQCiz4p3PykuUo2JsZiz2mjMHIc3tuIlOxIpTn%252fPZ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1d935a0be3e04544687508dceea6a6e9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638647646739200283%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ZBXfOUmcu6H5MBrbtu97%2ByNRXRVlFpUaWgMVZ6%2BOLvs%3D&reserved=0>
